mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.hc_form_ems AS "hcFormEms", a.year_term AS "yearTerm", a.hc_form_bkh AS "hcFormBkh", a.hc_form_xm AS "hcFormXm", a.hc_form_sfzh AS "hcFormSfzh", a.hc_form_dz AS "hcFormDz", a.hc_form_sjf AS "hcFormSjf", a.hc_form_remarks AS "hcFormRemarks", a.hc_form_status AS "hcFormStatus"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rs_student_ems( id, year_term, hc_form_ems, hc_form_bkh, hc_form_xm, hc_form_sfzh, hc_form_dz, hc_form_sjf, hc_form_remarks, hc_form_status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{yearTerm}, #{hcFormEms}, #{hcFormBkh}, #{hcFormXm}, #{hcFormSfzh}, #{hcFormDz}, #{hcFormSjf}, #{hcFormRemarks}, #{hcFormStatus} )
mapper.update: UPDATE rs_student_ems SET year_term = #{yearTerm}, hc_form_ems = #{hcFormEms}, hc_form_bkh = #{hcFormBkh}, hc_form_xm = #{hcFormXm}, hc_form_sfzh = #{hcFormSfzh}, hc_form_dz = #{hcFormDz}, hc_form_sjf = #{hcFormSjf}, hc_form_remarks = #{hcFormRemarks}, hc_form_status = #{hcFormStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
